Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the business investment growth under Republican policies by stating it is "10 times faster" than under President Obama.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only compares the final two years of the Obama administration to a little over the first two years of the Trump administration, which may not provide a comprehensive analysis.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the business investment growth can be solely attributed to Republican policies, disregarding other factors at work.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert suggests that there are many other factors at work in the recent growth, indicating that there may be alternative explanations for the business investment growth.
